JobArgumentationTime.description: Time spent in argumentation during a job

JobCompleteCount.description: Indicator of whether a given job was ever completed

JobCompletionTime.description: Time taken to complete a given job

JobDiveSitesCount.description: Number of dive sites visited during a job

JobDiveTime.description: Time spent diving during a job

JobExperimentationTime.description: Time spent in experimentation during a job

JobModelingTime.description: Time spent in modeling during a job

JobGuideCount.description: Number of times player talked with guide during a job

JobHelpCount.description: Number of times player asked for help during a job

JobName.description: The name of the Job with given index in the 'level_range'

JobStartCount.description: Indicator of whether a given job was ever accepted

JobTasksCompleted.description: Number of tasks completed for a given job

JobsAttempted.description: Subfeatures for number of job starts and completes, percent complete, and avg/std time to complete

num-starts.description: Number of accept_job events for a given job id

num-completes.description: Number of complete_job events for a given job id

percent-complete.description: Percent of jobs which were accepted and completed

avg-time-complete.description: Average time taken from accepting to completing a job

std-dev-complete.description: Standard deviation of time taken to complete

SyncCompletionTime.description: Time taken to achieve 100% sync in a simulation

SessionDiveSitesCount.description: Time spent playing in a given session

SessionDuration.description: Time spent playing in a given session

SessionGuideCount.description: Number of times player talked with the guide throughout the session

SessionHelpCount.description: Number of times player clicked the help button throughout the session

SessionID.description: The player's session ID number for this play session

SessionJobsCompleted.description: Number of jobs completed in a given session

SwitchJobsCount.description: Number of times player switched jobs before completion

TopJobCompletionDestinations.description: Top five most accepted jobs after previously completing a given job

TopJobSwitchDestinations.description: Top five most accepted jobs after switching away from a given job

TotalDiveTime.description: Total time spent in dive sites
